name: @pokemon-battle/monorepo
description: Pokemon Battle - Monorepo avec Frontend, Backend et Package Shared

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:shared"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck --workspace=shared && npm run typecheck --workspace=backend && npm run typecheck --workspace=frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=frontend && npm run lint --workspace=backend
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=backend && npm run test --workspace=frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspace=shared && npm run clean --workspace=backend && npm run clean --workspace=frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=shared && npm install --workspace=backend && npm install --workspace=frontend

author: Your Name
